Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: This should be no value or `kubeconfig`

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: The credentials to use to connect to the K8S cluster API. This needs to be in `kubeconfig` format. Example: https://github.com/Keyfactor/k8s-orchestrator/tree/main/scripts/kubernetes#example-service-account-json

Properties.Name: ServerUseSsl
Properties.Description: Use SSL to connect to the K8S cluster API.

Properties.Name: KubeNamespace
Properties.Description: The K8S namespace to use to manage the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretName
Properties.Description: The name of the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretType
Properties.Description: This defaults to and must be `jks`

Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: This should be no value or `kubeconfig`

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: The credentials to use to connect to the K8S cluster API. This needs to be in `kubeconfig` format. Example: https://github.com/Keyfactor/k8s-orchestrator/tree/main/scripts/kubernetes#example-service-account-json

Properties.Name: ServerUseSsl
Properties.Description: Use SSL to connect to the K8S cluster API.

Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: This should be no value or `kubeconfig`

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: The credentials to use to connect to the K8S cluster API. This needs to be in `kubeconfig` format. Example: https://github.com/Keyfactor/k8s-orchestrator/tree/main/scripts/kubernetes#example-service-account-json

Properties.Name: ServerUseSsl
Properties.Description: Use SSL to connect to the K8S cluster API.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretKey
Properties.Description: The field name to use when looking for PFX/PKCS12 data in the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: PasswordFieldName
Properties.Description: The field name to use when looking for the password to the PFX/PKCS12 data in the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: PasswordIsK8SSecret
Properties.Description: Indicates whether the password to the PFX/PKCS12 data is stored in a separate K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: KubeNamespace
Properties.Description: The K8S namespace to use to manage the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretName
Properties.Description: The name of the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: This should be no value or `kubeconfig`

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: The credentials to use to connect to the K8S cluster API. This needs to be in `kubeconfig` format. Example: https://github.com/Keyfactor/k8s-orchestrator/tree/main/scripts/kubernetes#example-service-account-json

Properties.Name: ServerUseSsl
Properties.Description: Use SSL to connect to the K8S cluster API.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretType
Properties.Description: This defaults to and must be `pkcs12`

Properties.Name: StorePasswordPath
Properties.Description: The path to the K8S secret object to use as the password to the PFX/PKCS12 data. Example: `<namespace>/<secret_name>`

Properties.Name: KubeNamespace
Properties.Description: The K8S namespace to use to manage the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretName
Properties.Description: The name of the K8S secret object.

Properties.Name: KubeSecretType
Properties.Description: This defaults to and must be `secret`
